medical_history.chief_complaint: RUQ abdominal pain, nausea, emesis for 2 days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain was sudden in onset, constant in nature, and has persisted for 2 days. The patient reports taking a minimal amount of sips PO and experiences nausea and emesis approximately multiple times per day, which is yellow/clear in color. There have been no prior episodes of similar symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: PVD, ovarian cancer, endometrial cancer, breast cancer, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, hypothyroidism, pulmonary hypertension, diabetes mellitus, chronic kidney disease.
